name: conceal-reveal
description: A tiny vanilla-js library to conceal/reveal elements

scripts.clean: rimraf css/ cjs/ es/ iife/ docs/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:iife && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:iife: rollup -f iife -n ConcealReveal -o iife/conceal-reveal.js es/conceal-reveal.js && uglifyjs -c -m -o iife/conceal-reveal.min.js iife/conceal-reveal.js
scripts.build:css: copyfiles -f src/conceal-reveal.css css/ && postcss css/conceal-reveal.css -o css/conceal-reveal.min.css -u cssnano --no-map
scripts.build:demo: pug src/index.pug -o docs/ -O package.json && copyfiles -f css/conceal-reveal.min.css iife/conceal-reveal.min.js docs/
